channel.title: Qubes-Whonix version 14 (Debian stretch based) can be upgraded to version 15 (Debian buster based). - Testers Wanted!
channel.description:
Upgrades are possible.
Qubes-Whonix version **14** (Debian **stretch** based) can be upgraded to version **15** (Debian **buster** based).
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Upgrading_Whonix_14_to_Whonix_15
Testers wanted!
----
New Qubes-Whonix 15 TemplateVM downloads are unavailable at this time and will require more time ([prerequisite](https://github.com/QubesOS/qubes-issues/issues/4970)). Another news will be posted when these become available.
----
Other Whonix platforms version 15: See [Whonix News Blog](https://forums.whonix.org/c/news)

item.title: Qubes-Whonix version 14 (Debian stretch based) can be upgraded to version 15 (Debian buster based). - Testers Wanted!
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
TNT_BOM_BOM:

Yes:

This issue is fixed now with latest upgrades of Whonix 15

Read full topic
item.source: Qubes-Whonix version 14 (Debian stretch based) can be upgraded to version 15 (Debian buster based). - Testers Wanted!

item.title: Qubes-Whonix version 14 (Debian stretch based) can be upgraded to version 15 (Debian buster based). - Testers Wanted!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
TNT_BOM_BOM:

installing git-all package will results into damaging Whonix-ws-15:

https://privatebin.net/?3e85d10070c10735#9Q8yy+JMmmSYyelnUPtmbN4belioCLQ4PNITf2ZZ0GU=

This issue only in Whonix not in Debian template.

Command used:

sudo apt install git-all

There are now really good workarounds posted here:
https://phabricator.whonix.org/T921

There’s also a detailed analysis of the Depends: / Recommends: chain analyzing the issue.

Read full topic
item.source: Qubes-Whonix version 14 (Debian stretch based) can be upgraded to version 15 (Debian buster based). - Testers Wanted!

item.title: Qubes-Whonix version 14 (Debian stretch based) can be upgraded to version 15 (Debian buster based). - Testers Wanted!
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
Patrick:

Some dependency issue. Will look into it. Could you report to
phabricator please?

https://phabricator.whonix.org/T921

Patrick:

Thanks. Unfortunately won’t be fixed until we have a new python gui
contributor. Could you please copy this report to phabricator?

https://phabricator.whonix.org/T922

Read full topic
item.source: Qubes-Whonix version 14 (Debian stretch based) can be upgraded to version 15 (Debian buster based). - Testers Wanted!

item.title: Qubes-Whonix version 14 (Debian stretch based) can be upgraded to version 15 (Debian buster based). - Testers Wanted!
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
Patrick:

Could you report this to qubes-issues please?

Done:

github.com/QubesOS/qubes-issues

Issue: Debian Buster Network Yellow Mark - Qubes Manager

opened by TNTBOMBOM on 2019-06-23 
Qubes OS version
4.0.1
Affected component(s) or functionality
Qubes Manager
Brief summary
Installing Debian Buster 10 from testing then open Basic settings page from Qubes manager...
P: default T: bug

Read full topic
item.source: Qubes-Whonix version 14 (Debian stretch based) can be upgraded to version 15 (Debian buster based). - Testers Wanted!

item.title: Qubes-Whonix version 14 (Debian stretch based) can be upgraded to version 15 (Debian buster based). - Testers Wanted!
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
Patrick:

But after installation of thunar and that package does thunar work for you as expected in Debian buster template?

Yes:

Read full topic
item.source: Qubes-Whonix version 14 (Debian stretch based) can be upgraded to version 15 (Debian buster based). - Testers Wanted!

item.title: Qubes-Whonix version 14 (Debian stretch based) can be upgraded to version 15 (Debian buster based). - Testers Wanted!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
But after installation of thunar and that package does thunar work for you as expected in Debian buster template?

Buster template:

  • https://github.com/QubesOS/updates-status/issues/1171
  • https://github.com/QubesOS/qubes-issues/issues/4970#issuecomment-504789219
sudo qubes-dom0-update --enablerepo=qubes-templates-itl-testing qubes-template-debian-10

Read full topic
item.source: Qubes-Whonix version 14 (Debian stretch based) can be upgraded to version 15 (Debian buster based). - Testers Wanted!

item.title: Qubes-Whonix version 14 (Debian stretch based) can be upgraded to version 15 (Debian buster based). - Testers Wanted!
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
Patrick:

Probably also missing in Qubes Debian buster templates, right? If yes, could you report a Qubes bug please?

Its missing in Debian Buster templates because its KDE/Nautilaus based templates not on XFCE. Though the package still can be installable:

user@debian-10:~$ sudo apt install qubes-core-agent-thunar 
Reading package lists... Done
Building dependency tree       
Reading state information... Done

  libxfce4util-bin libxfce4util-common libxfce4util7 libxfconf-0-2 thunar
  thunar-data thunar-volman tumbler tumbler-common xfconf
Suggested packages:
  devhelp thunar-archive-plugin thunar-media-tags-plugin tumbler-plugins-extra
The following NEW packages will be installed:
  exo-utils libexo-2-0 libexo-common libexo-helpers libthunarx-3-0
  libtumbler-1-0 libxfce4panel-2.0-4 libxfce4ui-2-0 libxfce4ui-common
  libxfce4util-bin libxfce4util-common libxfce4util7 libxfconf-0-2
  qubes-core-agent-thunar thunar thunar-data thunar-volman tumbler
  tumbler-common xfconf

item.source: Qubes-Whonix version 14 (Debian stretch based) can be upgraded to version 15 (Debian buster based). - Testers Wanted!

item.title: Qubes-Whonix version 14 (Debian stretch based) can be upgraded to version 15 (Debian buster based). - Testers Wanted!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Since there will be Qubes-Whonix 15 downloadable TemplateVMs soon… Please follow https://phabricator.whonix.org/feed/ to avoid duplicate bug reports.

Read full topic
item.source: Qubes-Whonix version 14 (Debian stretch based) can be upgraded to version 15 (Debian buster based). - Testers Wanted!

item.title: Qubes-Whonix version 14 (Debian stretch based) can be upgraded to version 15 (Debian buster based). - Testers Wanted!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Patrick:

Debian buster template now available? See:

https://github.com/QubesOS/updates-status/issues/1161

https://github.com/QubesOS/qubes-issues/issues/4970#issuecomment-504000252

sudo qubes-dom0-update --enablerepo=qubes-templates-itl-testing qubes-template-buster

Read full topic
item.source: Qubes-Whonix version 14 (Debian stretch based) can be upgraded to version 15 (Debian buster based). - Testers Wanted!

item.title: Qubes-Whonix version 14 (Debian stretch based) can be upgraded to version 15 (Debian buster based). - Testers Wanted!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
TNT_BOM_BOM via Whonix Forum:

installing git-all package will results into damaging Whonix-ws-15:

https://privatebin.net/?3e85d10070c10735#9Q8yy+JMmmSYyelnUPtmbN4belioCLQ4PNITf2ZZ0GU=

This issue only in Whonix not in Debian template.

Command used:

sudo apt install git-all

Some dependency issue. Will look into it. Could you report to
phabricator please?

Read full topic
item.source: Qubes-Whonix version 14 (Debian stretch based) can be upgraded to version 15 (Debian buster based). - Testers Wanted!

item.title: Qubes-Whonix version 14 (Debian stretch based) can be upgraded to version 15 (Debian buster based). - Testers Wanted!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
TNT_BOM_BOM via Whonix Forum:

  • This issue mostly needs graphical fixation but just reporting it to be notified:

Tor-Control-Panel has extra bridge (snowflake) feature which are missed in ACW & normal TBB: (it seems doesnt has any effect)

Thanks. Unfortunately won’t be fixed until we have a new python gui
contributor. Could you please copy this report to phabricator?

  • Whonix-WS-15 Only issue when its connected to GW it shows yellow sign. (no other templates showing that like e.g whonix 14 or debian …etc)

Could you report this to qubes-issues please?

Read full topic
item.source: Qubes-Whonix version 14 (Debian stretch based) can be upgraded to version 15 (Debian buster based). - Testers Wanted!

item.title: Qubes-Whonix version 14 (Debian stretch based) can be upgraded to version 15 (Debian buster based). - Testers Wanted!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
TNT_BOM_BOM:

Not yet ported into Qubes stable repos, so i will wait until then and i will check it

Debian buster template now available? See:

https://github.com/QubesOS/updates-status/issues/1161

https://github.com/QubesOS/qubes-issues/issues/4970#issuecomment-504000252

Read full topic
item.source: Qubes-Whonix version 14 (Debian stretch based) can be upgraded to version 15 (Debian buster based). - Testers Wanted!

item.title: Qubes-Whonix version 14 (Debian stretch based) can be upgraded to version 15 (Debian buster based). - Testers Wanted!
item.dc:creator: minimal
item.description:
Hello,
I have been testing Whonix 15 for a couple of days. So far, so god. However, the above mentioned problem with Thunar remains.

apt-get install qubes-core-agent-thunar

does not fix it.

Cheers.

Read full topic

item.title: Qubes-Whonix version 14 (Debian stretch based) can be upgraded to version 15 (Debian buster based). - Testers Wanted!
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
installing git-all package will results into damaging Whonix-ws-15:

https://privatebin.net/?3e85d10070c10735#9Q8yy+JMmmSYyelnUPtmbN4belioCLQ4PNITf2ZZ0GU=

This issue only in Whonix not in Debian template.

Command used:

sudo apt install git-all

Read full topic

item.title: Qubes-Whonix version 14 (Debian stretch based) can be upgraded to version 15 (Debian buster based). - Testers Wanted!
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
• This issue mostly needs graphical fixation but just reporting it to be notified:

Tor-Control-Panel has extra bridge (snowflake) feature which are missed in ACW & normal TBB: (it seems doesnt has any effect)

  • Whonix-WS-15 Only issue when its connected to GW it shows yellow sign. (no other templates showing that like e.g whonix 14 or debian …etc)

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Looks really good. No issues as far as I can see.

Can you still reproduce that whonixcheck error?

TNT_BOM_BOM:

Jun 05 12:36:00.308 [warn] Failed to parse/validate config: If you set UseBridges, you must specify at least one bridge.

item.source: Qubes-Whonix version 14 (Debian stretch based) can be upgraded to version 15 (Debian buster based). - Testers Wanted!

item.title: Qubes-Whonix version 14 (Debian stretch based) can be upgraded to version 15 (Debian buster based). - Testers Wanted!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
But…

/usr/local/etc/torrc.d/40_tor_control_panel.conf

has contents?

Could you please check all of these 4 files? Any of these files mentioning UseBridges? Should really be /usr/local/etc/torrc.d/40_tor_control_panel.conf anyhow if ACW was used.

In theory if only ACW was used and no manual use then /usr/local/etc/torrc.d/40_tor_control_panel.conf might show a bug and that file might be incomplete / no longer compatible with Tor so it might be an ACW bug.

Read full topic
item.source: Qubes-Whonix version 14 (Debian stretch based) can be upgraded to version 15 (Debian buster based). - Testers Wanted!

item.title: Qubes-Whonix version 14 (Debian stretch based) can be upgraded to version 15 (Debian buster based). - Testers Wanted!
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
sorry my mistake the directory working but the 50_user.conf is empty

by empty i mean like this reading:

github.com

Whonix/anon-gw-anonymizer-config/blob/master/usr/share/anon-gw-anonymizer-config/user_torrc_template.conf

# Tor user specific configuration file
#
# Add user modifications below this line:
############################################

meaning all good readings.

Patrick:

I guess you used ACW?

yes correct

Read full topic
item.source: Qubes-Whonix version 14 (Debian stretch based) can be upgraded to version 15 (Debian buster based). - Testers Wanted!

item.title: Qubes-Whonix version 14 (Debian stretch based) can be upgraded to version 15 (Debian buster based). - Testers Wanted!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Also it would be good if you could read, understand and compare with git each of these files:

/etc/tor/torrc
/etc/torrc.d/95_whonix.conf
/usr/local/etc/torrc.d/40_tor_control_panel.conf
/usr/local/etc/torrc.d/50_user.conf
  • https://github.com/Whonix/anon-gw-anonymizer-config/blob/master/etc/tor/torrc.anondist
  • https://github.com/Whonix/anon-gw-anonymizer-config/blob/master/etc/torrc.d/95_whonix.conf
  • https://github.com/Whonix/anon-gw-anonymizer-config/blob/master/usr/share/anon-gw-anonymizer-config/tor_control_panel_torrc_template.conf
  • https://github.com/Whonix/anon-gw-anonymizer-config/blob/master/usr/share/anon-gw-anonymizer-config/user_torrc_template.conf

I guess you used ACW?

TNT_BOM_BOM:

Jun 05 12:36:00.308 [warn] Failed to parse/validate config: If you set UseBridges, you must specify at least one bridge.

By looking at all of these files, that error should be explainable or at least point to some bug.

Read full topic
